Site.Name: KENTUCKY RIVER AT LOCK 2 AT LOCKPORT, KY

SiteVisit.WeatherDescription: partly cloudy, cool, no precip, calm winds
SiteVisit.Comment: First QW sample! Radios locked up and stage acting weird. Nitrogen tank is still good and seems to be ok so we will not change at this time. Orifice could be covered in sediment which could be why stage was acting weird--purged. Updating firmware on radios to hopefully solve issue of locking up.

SensorInspection.Comment: increased line PSI to 28-30. possible sedimentation over orifice line.

DischargeMeasurement.Comment:
QRev - QRev Main 10/19/2018 07:21:38: - ADCP moved during the first part of the 3d transect. Unit was re-adjusted and tightened to stay in place while DCP was collecting data. Possible negative flow on LEW. Last transect (#5) started accidentally- do not use.
QRev - GPS 10/19/2018 07:24:22: - Bad GGA. Will use BT. no MB.
QRev - FileSave 10/19/2018 07:25:03: - 20181019_072503_QRev by mlott Q=13059.562 ft3/s
QRev - FileSave 10/19/2018 07:45:52: - 20181019_074552_QRev by mlott Q=13059.562 ft3/s

Note.NoteText: ADCP moved during the first part of the 3d transect. Unit was re-adjusted and tightened to stay in place while DCP was collecting data. Possible negative flow on LEW. Last transect (#5) started accidentally- do not use.
Bad GGA. Will use BT. no MB.

AdcpDischargeMeasurement.InstrumentConfiguration: Fixed CR1 CF11110 BA30 BC220 BE100 BP1 BR2 ES0 EX10111 TE00000000TP000020 WA50 WE1500 WF50 WM1 WN50 WP1 WS50 WV170 WZ005 &R20 Wizard TP000009 BX299 BM5 WF25 WM12 WV175 WN58 WK25 WO3, 7 WS25 User

QRevXML.UserComment: QRev Main 10/19/2018 07:21:38: ADCP moved during the first part of the 3d transect. Unit was re-adjusted and tightened to stay in place while DCP was collecting data. Possible negative flow on LEW. Last transect (#5) started accidentally- do not use. |||GPS 10/19/2018 07:24:22: Bad GGA. Will use BT. no MB. |||FileSave 10/19/2018 07:25:03: 20181019_072503_QRev by mlott Q=13059.562 ft3/s |||FileSave 10/19/2018 07:45:52: 20181019_074552_QRev by mlott Q=13059.562 ft3/s |||
